Articles.Content:
It allows people to upload directly to steam.

As a person looking to download.

You can of open an item from steam website or the steam program. Read what its about.

If you like it. Click subscribe. Done.

Steam does all the rest.

Its downloaded into all the appropriate folders.

No need to go to other websites and do all that's done now.

Squad is not interested in doing this. Perhaps they might change their minds later, or they might not. But in the meantime, it's one of the subjects that has been hashed over so many times that it's been placed on our list of things not to suggest anymore, to keep forum discussions progressing on productive lines. Sorry, but this thread will be closed now.
